notes: JSON files always start with either an array [], or an ojbect {}
JSON files cannot have comments, so put any comments in this array
JSON files is used for Javascript, object, location, and how we trasform data
Commas go between items in an array or object, but there should never be a trailing comma
All property names must be inside quotation marks
All string quotation marks must be double quotes
Use a linter like jsonlint.com to check json
